topic.title: Las Vegas Shooting General
topic.body:
For as far as we know, the Las Vegas shooting happened recently.

This is a megathread to collect infos. Here are some clearnet links about the shooting:
https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/post-nation/wp/2017/10/05/las-vegas-shooting-motive-remains-elusive-as-new-details-emerge-about-attack/
http://www.cnn.com/2017/10/05/us/las-vegas-shooting-investigation/index.html

Time to collect informations, mein negroes.

1_1626jBiKnxjqtA1UJrSQEF1zWk3CMHZrLR.body: Were trolled by a libertarian. GUesss there's no more safe spaces left for antifags

5_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu.body:
Hello my man, do you think it'll be possible to post articles in other languages than english on ZeroMedium?

Also, will you curate or is it going to be pure

9_1H5UJ7LneToGqYqJ9fbLnu1Ko2pxTpchof.body: I'm terribly sorry, but why would anyone spend time to learn the basically useless language of Esperanto?

> [krixano](#comment_45_12gAes6NzDS9E2q6Q1UXrpUdbPS6nvuBPu): There are many benefits to learning any language. However, some languages are easier to learn than others. Some languages have much in common with other languages, therefore making those other languages easier to learn if you wanted to learn a third language. Some languages expand your mental idea's/state by being more different semantically, grammatically, and pragmatically than your native language. There are many others. Esperanto hits many of these.

Bullshit my man, somewhere around to 10 million people talk esperanto. Now let's look at french: 274 millions. 
Only difference is one group are pseudo-intellectual faggot while the other is an ethno-linguistic group, which pseudo intellectual faggots tend not to like.

I already learned english, my mother tongue is french. SO why would I want to learn esperanto? If it's to learn more languages, I'll learn Lojban, not esperanto. All you're doing is shill a shitty language hoping people will give a shit about it.
